name: Till Daybreak
description:
It's nighttime and you're stuck in a dungeon with bad spirits! 

What can you do to survive the night?

 Grab the nearest crucifix, your prayers will do the rest :)

Controls:

move = arrow keys (UP/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT)

Credit to artisticdude for the only two sounds in the game

https://opengameart.org/content/rpg-sound-pack
